description.value: Your drone discharges electricity around it in a volatile attack, dealing @Damage[1d6[electricity]] damage in your choice of a @Template[type:cone|distance:15] or a @Template[type:line|distance:30]. Creatures in the area can attempt a @Check[reflex|against:class|basic] save against your class DC. Your drone can't use this ability again for [[/gmr 1d4 #Recharge this ability]]{1d4 rounds}. For every additional two levels you have, the damage increases by [[/r 1d6]].
